title: One MILLION visits
author: VD
content_html:
Thanks to all of you, friend and foe alike, we’re now cruising along at a rate of one million visits per year. It will be interesting to see how long it takes to go from one million per annum to two million, or even one million per month.

If TIA is well-received, (or if a certain hardware project is successful), that may happen sooner than any of us might think. But in any case, this blog exists primarily for pleasure, not profit, and so we shall continue to cruise along regardless of what happens.
content_text:
Thanks to all of you, friend and foe alike, we’re now cruising along at a rate of one million visits per year.  It will be interesting to see how long it takes to go from one million per annum to two million, or even one million per month.
If TIA is well-received, (or if a certain hardware project is successful), that may happen sooner than any of us might think.  But in any case, this blog exists primarily for pleasure, not profit, and so we shall continue to cruise along regardless of what happens.
